div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 367651003 (Malignant Neoplasm (Morphology))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 399919001 (Carcinoma in situ - category (morphologic abnormality))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 399983006 (In situ adenomatous neoplasm - category (morphologic abnormality))

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
399878004Malignant neoplasm with pilar differentiation (morphologic abnormality)
253035009In situ melanocytic morphology (morphologic abnormality)

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 450893003 (Papillary neoplasm, pancreatobiliary-type, with high grade intraepithelial neoplasia (morphologic abnormality))
Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 128640002 (Prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia, grade III)
Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 450890000 (Glandular intraepithelial neoplasia, low grade)
Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 703548001 (Atypical hyperplasia of the endometrium)

description.value: Codes representing the structure, arrangement, and behavioral characteristics of malignant neoplasms, and cancer cells. Inclusion criteria: in situ neoplasms and malignant neoplasms. Exclusion criteria: benign neoplasms and neoplasms of unspecified behavior. Note: ICD-O-3 morphology codes are referenced in the logical definition but not expanded in the value set for intellectual property reasons. For primary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /1, /2, or /3. For secondary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /6.

display.value: Malignant neoplasm with pilar differentiation (morphologic abnormality)
